title._content: Ruins of an old sugar mill and plantation house, vicinity of Christiansted, Saint Croix, Virgin Islands  (LOC)

description._content: Delano, Jack,, photographer. Ruins of an old sugar mill and plantation house, vicinity of Christiansted, Saint Croix, Virgin Islands 1941 Dec. 1 slide : color. Notes: Title from FSA or OWI agency caption. Transfer from U.S. Office of War Information, 1944. Subjects: Sugar plantations Sugar industry Ruins United States--Virgin Islands of the United States--Christiansted Format: Slides--Color Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Farm Security Administration - Office of War Information Collection 11671-26 (DLC) 93845501 General information about the FSA/OWI Color Photographs is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.fsac Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/fsac.1a33950 Call Number: LC-USF35-412
